headline: How Recent Analyst Shifts Are Rewriting The Story For Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ)
summary: What Is Driving the New Fair Value Estimate for Johnson & Johnson? The fair value estimate for Johnson & Johnson has shifted from about US$224.09 to roughly US$231.25 per share, and the revenue growth assumption has moved from about 5.81% to roughly 6.04%, with a small change in the discount rate from 6.96% to 6.98% to reflect a slightly different view of risk. Recent Street research has tilted more positive, with several firms raising price targets and one new initiation that calls the stock...
